mapper.insert: insert into customer(cust_email, cust_password, cust_nickname, cust_address, cust_birthday, cust_gender, cust_target_price) values (#{cust_email}, #{cust_password}, #{cust_nickname}, #{cust_address}, #{cust_birthday}, #{cust_gender}, #{cust_target_price, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select nvl(sub_category_num, 'null') from sub_category where category_num = 'L01' and sub_category_name = #{keyword}
select sub_category_num from category_data where minimum_category = #{keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into bill values(bill_seq.nextval, #{customerId}, to_date(#{billDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalPrice}, #{payment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select billNo from bill where rownum = 1 order by billNo desc
